00001 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00002 //Description: Handle database I/O and user interface 
00003 //             for CDC geometry parameters
00004 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00005 //Created: 6 Oct, 2012
00006 //Modified: 21 Oct, 2012
00007 //Comment: The units are "mm"(default), "um"(for wire radius) and "rad". 
00008 //Comment: for SPhi, Datum plain is backward end plate of CDC
00009 //Comment: about layer_type:
00010 //         phi direction: 
00011 //                0_________2pi
00012 //
00013 //         r   direction:
00014 //                 ^  Cdc_RMax
00015 //                 |
00016 //                 |
00017 //                 |  0
00018 //
00019 //         TYPE 0: Ordinary layer
00020 //                 ________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00021 //                 |      | 3 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00022 //                 |o  x  |
00023 //                 |      |
00024 //                 |o  o  |
00025 //                 --------
00026 //
00027 //         TYPE 1: Out most layer
00028 //                 ________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00029 //                 |o  o  | 5 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00030 //                 |      |
00031 //                 |o  x  |
00032 //                 |      |
00033 //                 |o  o  |
00034 //                 --------
00035 //
00036 //         TYPE 2/3/4/5: Stereo layer upon an axial layer/
00037 //                       Axial layer beneath a stereo layer/
00038 //                       Axial layer upon a stereo layer/
00039 //                       Stereo layer beneath an axial layer/
00040 //                 __________ each cell is a G4TwistedTube subtracted by a G4Hype
00041 //                 |        | with 3 field wire and 1 signal wire inside
00042 //                 |o0  x   | for TYPE 2/4, the innerward two field wires
00043 //                 |        | have the rotate angle as half as the stereo layer
00044 //                 |o1  o2  | 
00045 //                 ---------- 
00046 //Comment: fVerboseLevel: 0:    Just Warning Messages and Error Messages
00047 //                        1:    + Dump()
00048 //                        >= 5: All informations
00049 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00100                 //layer info
00101                 G4int get_LayerNo() {return LayerNo;}
00102                 G4double get_Cdc_RMax() {return Cdc_RMax;}
00103                 G4double get_layer_length(G4int layerId) {
00104                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_length[layerId];
00105                         else return 0;
00106                 }
00107                 G4double get_layer_RMin(G4int layerId) {
00108                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_RMin[layerId];
00109                         else return 0;
00110                 }
00111                 G4double get_layer_RMid(G4int layerId) {
00112                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_RMid[layerId];
00113                         else return 0;
00114                 }

00116                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_SPhi[layerId];
00117                         else return 0;
00118                 }
00119                 G4double get_layer_ncells4rotate(G4int layerId) {
00120                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_ncells4rotate[layerId];
00121                         else return 0;
00122                 }
00123                 G4double get_layer_angle4rotate( G4int layerId ){
00124                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_angle4rotate[layerId];
00125                         else return 0;
00126                 }
00127                 G4int get_layer_cell_num(G4int layerId) {
00128                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_cell_num[layerId];

00133                         else return 0;

00135                 G4int get_layer_type(G4int layerId) {
00136                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_type[layerId];
00137                         else return 0;
00138                 }
00139                 G4double get_layer_cell_dphi( G4int layerId ){
00140                         if( check_layerId(layerId) ) return layer_cell_dphi[layerId];
00141                         else return 0;
00142                 }
00143                 G4int get_ReplicaNo( G4int layerId, G4int cellId ) {
00144                         if( check_layerId(layerId) && check_cellId(layerId, cellId) ) return cellId + layer_cell_startNo[layerId];
00145                         else return 0;
00146                 }
00147                 G4int get_layerIdcellId( G4int ReplicaNo, G4int* layerId, G4int* cellId ){
00148                         for ( G4int i = 0; i <= LayerNo; i++ ){
00149                                 if ( ReplicaNo < layer_cell_startNo[i] ){
00150                                         *layerId = i - 1;
00151                                         *cellId = ReplicaNo - layer_cell_startNo[i-1];
00152                                         return 0;//found it
00153                                 }
00154                         }
00155                         return 1;//not found!
00156                 }
00157                 //phi at the middle
00158                 G4double get_layer_cell_phi( G4int layerId, G4int cellId ){
00159                         if( !check_layerId(layerId) || !check_cellId(layerId, cellId) ) return 0;
00160                         G4double phi = layer_SPhi[layerId] + layer_angle4rotate[layerId]/2. + (cellId + ( 1. - layer_firstWire[layerId] )/2. )*layer_cell_dphi[layerId];
00161                         return phi;
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 //other settings
00165                 bool get_vis_layer(){return vis_layer;}
00166                 G4double get_r_layer(){return r_layer;}
00167                 G4double get_g_layer(){return g_layer;}
00168                 G4double get_b_layer(){return b_layer;}
00169                 bool get_vis_cell(){return vis_cell;}
00170                 G4double get_r_cell(){return r_cell;}
00171                 G4double get_g_cell(){return g_cell;}

00174                 bool get_vis_SignalWire(){return vis_SignalWire;}
00175                 G4double get_r_FieldWire(){return r_FieldWire;}
00176                 G4double get_g_FieldWire(){return g_FieldWire;}
00177                 G4double get_b_FieldWire(){return b_FieldWire;}
00178                 G4double get_r_SignalWire(){return r_SignalWire;}

00180                 G4double get_b_SignalWire(){return b_SignalWire;}

00182         private:
00183 
00184                 //=> check
00185                 bool check_layerId(int layerId){
00186                         if ( layerId < LayerNo ) return true;
00187                         else{
00188                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter, layerId is out of range! layerId = "<<layerId<<", LayerNo = "<<LayerNo<<std::endl;
00189                                 return false;
00190                         }
00191                 }
00192                 bool check_cellId(int layerId, int cellId){
00193                         if ( cellId < layer_cell_num[layerId] ) return true;
00194                         else{
00195                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter, cellId is out of range! cellId = "<<cellId<<", cellNo= "<<layer_cell_num[layerId]<<std::endl;
00196                                 return false;
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199                 bool check_LayerNo( int No ){
00200                         if( No != LayerNo ){
00201                                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), insufficient layer info! LayerNo = "<<LayerNo<<", whilie only "<<No<<" layers were found."<<std::endl;
00202                                 return false;
00203                         }
00204                         else return true;
00205                 }
